info.name: Big Chungus api Documentation
info.description:
Here you can check info about the rest API created for our web app, like descriptions, parámeters or even posibles responses.

PD: In end Points which return arrays as data said array is not shown (for space purposes) and is replace with the simbol "[]", in any case, that array will contain objects of the data returned in the shown end point of thar table

item.name: Anime
item.description: API Endpoints for working with animes

request.description: Get info of every anime on the database

originalRequest.description: Get info of every anime on the database
Get info of every anime on the database

request.description: Create a new anime on the database

response.name: Store Response #1

originalRequest.description: Create a new anime on the database

response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Anime created successfully :)",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "One piece",
        "synopsis": "Too many episodes",
        "episodes": 900,
        "episodeLength": 25,
        "subtype": "TV",
        "status": "current",
        "ageRating": "G",
        "trailer": "https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/tM7qJQ1MVZY",
        "startDate": null,
        "endDate": null,
        "cover": null
    }
}

originalRequest.description: Create a new anime on the database

request.description: Get info about the specified anime

originalRequest.description: Get info about the specified anime
Get info about the specified anime

request.description: Update an existing anime from the database

        "synopsis": "Too many episodes",
        "episodes": 900,
        "episodeLength": 25,
        "subtype": "TV",
        "status": "current",

        "trailer": "https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/tM7qJQ1MVZY",
        "startDate": null,
        "endDate": null,
        "cover": null
    }
}
